scripts.lint: npm run lint:api && npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:extension && npm run lint:mcp
scripts.format: npm run format:api && npm run format:frontend && npm run format:extension && npm run format:mcp
scripts.dev:full: concurrently "cd api && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev" --names "API,Frontend" --prefix-colors "cyan,magenta"
scripts.test:e2e:dev: npm run dev:full & sleep 10 && cd frontend && npm run test:e2e; pkill -f "npm run dev"
